nodes.text: En'Tra'Tal was the capital city of the planet of Coyn. Translated into Basic, the name meant "King-City." En'Tra'Tal contained the Rols'Kus or "Arena of the Games" and the Arquas'Tais, the "Land of Fallen Ones of Valor", was located just outside the city. En'Tra'Tais or "Kingland" was a stellar class spaceport and largest on the planet that was also located in the city.
